snippets.html:
I drafted and filed motion to the agency re: (e.g., change venue, terminate).

snippets.html:
I filed EOIR-28 and supporting docs for the client.

I served motion/brief on DHS and filed proof of service with EOIR.

Served motion/brief on DHS and filed proof of service with EOIR.

snippets.name: Packet Prep
snippets.html:
I organized and paginated exhibit packet with index and tabs for EOIR filing.

Organized and paginated exhibit packet with index and tabs for EOIR filing.

snippets.name: File Audit
snippets.html:
I audited file for completeness before .

{key:tab}

Audited file for completeness before .

snippets.name: Calendar Update
snippets.html:
I updated Clio calendar with next deadlines/hearings.

Updated Clio calendar with next deadlines/hearings.

snippets.name: Motion Research
snippets.html:
I researched and prepared motion to the agency on .

{key:tab}

Researched and prepared motion to the agency on .

snippets.name: EOIR-28 Filed
snippets.html:
I filed a Notice of Appearance (EOIR-28).

{key:tab}

I entered my appearance and confirmed service according to Immigration Court practice.

snippets.name: Master Calendar Preparation
snippets.html:
I prepared for a Master Calendar Hearing.

{key:tab}

I reviewed pleadings, checked filing deadlines, and prepared a short case summary for the hearing.

snippets.name: Master Calendar Appearance
snippets.html:
I appeared for a Master Calendar Hearing before the Immigration Court.

{key:tab}

I announced my appearance, addressed scheduling, and confirmed the next hearing date.

snippets.name: Continuance Motion Filed
snippets.html:
I filed a motion to continue the hearing.

{key:tab}

I provided the basis for good cause and served opposing counsel.

snippets.name: Change of Venue Motion Filed
snippets.html:
I filed a motion to change venue.

{key:tab}

I explained the grounds for transfer and provided the new court information for scheduling.

snippets.name: Motion to Terminate Filed
snippets.html:
I filed a motion to terminate removal proceedings.

{key:tab}

I outlined legal grounds and attached supporting evidence for termination.

snippets.name: Administrative Closure Motion Filed
snippets.html:
I filed a motion for administrative closure.

{key:tab}

I argued that administrative closure is appropriate and served all parties.

snippets.name: Motion to Reopen Filed
snippets.html:
I filed a motion to reopen proceedings.

{key:tab}

I presented new evidence or changed circumstances supporting reopening.

snippets.name: Motion to Reconsider Filed
snippets.html:
I filed a motion to reconsider.

{key:tab}

I explained legal or factual errors and requested correction by the Immigration Court.

snippets.name: Merits Hearing Preparation
snippets.html:
I prepared for an Individual (Merits) Hearing.

{key:tab}

I organized exhibits, drafted a direct examination outline, and prepared witnesses.

snippets.name: Merits Hearing Appearance
snippets.html:
I appeared for an Individual (Merits) Hearing before the Immigration Court.

{key:tab}

I presented evidence, examined witnesses, and argued the requested relief.

snippets.name: Service and Proof of Service
snippets.html:
I served filings on the Department of Homeland Security and prepared proof of service.

{key:tab}

I verified service requirements and filed the proof with the Immigration Court.

snippets.name: Requested Hearing Transcript
snippets.html:
I requested a hearing transcript from the Immigration Court.

{key:tab}

I submitted the request and noted the expected processing timeline.

snippets.name: Record of Proceedings Review
snippets.html:
I reviewed the Record of Proceedings.

{key:tab}

I checked for completeness, noted missing documents, and planned follow-up requests.

snippets.name: BIA Appeal Filed
snippets.html:
I filed a notice of appeal with the Board of Immigration Appeals.

{key:tab}

I docketed briefing deadlines and confirmed service.

snippets.name: BIA Brief Drafted
snippets.html:
I drafted an appeal brief for the Board of Immigration Appeals.

{key:tab}

I framed issues, analyzed case law, and prepared supporting citations.

snippets.name: Updated Pleadings
snippets.html:
I updated pleadings before the Immigration Court.

{key:tab}

I confirmed removability allegations and relief applications and noted any objections.

snippets.name: Prepared Stipulation
snippets.html:
I prepared a stipulation for submission to the Immigration Court.

{key:tab}

I coordinated language with the Department of Homeland Security and finalized the draft.

snippets.name: Reviewed Court Order
snippets.html:
I reviewed a recent order from the Immigration Court.

{key:tab}

I summarized directives, calendared deadlines, and planned compliance steps.

snippets.name: CAT/Withholding Prep
snippets.html:
I prepared filings related to protection under the Convention Against Torture or withholding of removal.

{key:tab}

I collected country conditions, drafted declarations, and prepared legal arguments.
